text: I'm in! Where do we start?
I believe the work that @Joseph_Dolynai has done with translating the Holy Scripture could be of great help, and could be revised together.

Have you already started? 

To make our cooperation easier, I propose to create a shared Google Docs file with all the pieces of text that need to be translated (such as in a table format). That way each of us could write and comment on each other's translations until everyone is satisfied. 

You can give thumbs up to this message if you like this idea, and I can create and share the document.

If you have a more convenient way of working together or if you have already started on your own document, then please share it.

After the text is translated, we could ask the website owner to add it there. Do you know who the owner is?
1/20000 of distance from North Pole to the Equator
I know the domain owner, I married him üòä I'll create a shared chat for us.
